meanings.sent1: She will go whithersoever her friends go.
meanings.sent2: He travels whithersoever his work takes him.
meanings.sent3: The cat follows the laser pointer whithersoever it moves.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts wander whithersoever the wind blows.
meanings.sent5: The lost dog will follow you whithersoever you lead.

meanings.sent1: Please take me whithersoever you go.
meanings.sent2: The wind carries the seeds whithersoever it pleases.
meanings.sent3: The magician can make objects disappear and reappear whithersoever he wishes.
meanings.sent4: His love for her will follow him whithersoever he roams.
meanings.sent5: The river flows whithersoever the terrain allows.

meanings.sent1: You can find her whithersoever you look.
meanings.sent2: The stars shine brightly whithersoever you are.
meanings.sent3: The children play happily whithersoever they find space.
meanings.sent4: His love for adventure takes him whithersoever the road leads.
meanings.sent5: The scent of flowers lingers whithersoever the breeze carries it.
